about_the_game:
Cursed Dungeon Raider offers an immersive exploration adventure infused with eerie and horror elements. Embark on a quest to recover genuine historical artifacts from dangerous excavation sites. Navigate through dungeons and tombs filled with deadly traps and encounter mythological monsters unique to each region.



The in-game artifacts you will find are based on 3D scans of real historical artifacts. This means the game serves not only as entertainment but also an educational purpose, providing further information about these exhibits and their origins.



Donate those artifacts to a museum to gain archaeological reputation and access new excavation sites, or sell them on the black market to earn more money for purchasing exciting new equipment. Receive new missions from official institutes or fulfill orders for nefarious entities.



Prepare your equipment before embarking on your next journey. Ensure you have enough light sources to illuminate your path and reveal any traps ahead. Use chalk or stakes to mark your way back, and always make sure to carry sufficient first-aid supplies and repellents.



Travel the world and explore a wide variety of fascinating excavation sites, uncovering the secrets of ancient civilizations. From the snowy north to the remnants of ancient ruins in distant lands, every region holds its own mysteries. Wander through arid deserts where long-forgotten tombs and temples lie beneath the sands, or venture into remote areas where historical artifacts and buried treasures await discovery.



Display unearthed artifacts in your home gallery and showcase them to other players. Gather information on mythological monsters from each region, learning their strengths, weaknesses, and the methods to exorcise, banish, or neutralize them.

The adventure awaits ahead of you!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains skeletons, deceased people and other horrific visuals.
